channel.title: new-year-resolutions on all things considered...
channel.description: Recent content in new-year-resolutions on all things considered...

item.title: New Year Resolutions
item.description: So here I am, again claiming to stick to blogging. This time I’ll start with a look back at 2018 and my New Year resolutions that will make sure 2019 will be a blast. Last year was a challenge for me as so many things happened that impacted my work-life. I transitioned into management and became Engineering Lead in the Search department at Zalando. I was surprised at how much I actually like working with people.
